nodes.bodyText: Apply try catch to this line only

/*
         * If the youtube player is not in a proper state than it throws the  IllegalStateException.
         * To avoid the crash and continue the flow we are reinitializing the player here.
         * 
         * It may occur when the edX app was in background and user kills the device youtube app
         */
